node.doctext:
HERE IS THE POSTER AS IT STANDS

the two nodes I don't like:

[Nothing New about Ancient Greece Will Be Learned Until the Vatican is Plundered] by [donfreenut]

-- I love the title, but the actual writeup strikes out...

[Everything2 is decadent and depraved] by [knifegirl] looks like it's the responding half of a conversation.

please email me <nate@everything2.com> with suggestions for good nodes to put in the poster.
node.title: E2 Poster
